output: html_document
---
See the [online workshop notes](https://tesaunders.github.io/reproducible-r/) to revisit the lesson in your own time.

[R for Data Science](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/) is highly recommended as a general purpose introduction to R, and particularly the Tidyverse ecosystem of packages. 

[Tidy data](https://uoa-eresearch.github.io/tidy-data/) expands on some of the principles we talked about around keeping files and analyses organised.

See the [renv documentation](https://rstudio.github.io/renv/) for an overview of how to use renv with your projects.
